akn:section.akn:heading: Research, testing, development, and training by Secretary

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Scope The Secretary shall conduct research, testing, development, and training necessary to carry out the purposes of this chapter, including, but not limited to—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Contracts and grants with States, interstate agencies, and independent institutions

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Contracts and grants with States, interstate agencies, and independent institutions The Secretary is authorized to conduct research, testing, development, and training as authorized to be carried out by subsection (a) of this section by contracting for or making grants for the conduct of such research, testing, development, and training to States, interstate agencies, and independent institutions.
